content: I just updated RA in my macbook and find that suddenly all sysroot crates do not loaded at the startup. I have to set the withSysroot=true in the settings.json to make it works. Do anyone have this problem too ?
@Edwin Cheng , I see the bug, gonna fix
Cool, and thanks :pray:üèª

Yeah this was very unintuitive, when refactoring our config (removing 1 source of truth) I just put false a default value for withSysroot, though actualy the default was null.
This is what we had
